sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The RP-PPPoE package contains adsl-setup, adsl-start, adls-status, adsl-stop, pppoe, pppoe-relay, pppoe-server, and pppoe-sniff.

sect3.title: adsl-setup
sect3.para: A script for configuring the client. Configuration is then stored in /etc/ppp/pppoe.conf.

sect3.title: adsl-start
sect3.para: Starts the client using the options specified in /etc/ppp/pppoe.conf.

sect3.title: adsl-status
sect3.para: Displays the status of the adsl connection.

sect3.title: pppoe
sect3.para: This is the client itself. Generally it should not be started on its own.

sect3.title: pppoe-sniff
sect3.para: A small network sniffer designed to assist in setting PPPOE_EXTRA setttings.
